amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove language in the bill which allows the Secretary to increase the Federal share of costs above 80 percent for projects in rural areas so as to put all transportation projects on an even playing field and allow all qualified projects to fairly compete for TIGER grants, regardless of whether they take place in an urban area or a rural area.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to remove language in the bill which allows the Secretary to increase the Federal share of costs above 80 percent for projects in rural areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Dold.
